activity.header: What do you want to do with the S5 authority?

company-name.header: Are you applying on behalf of a company or as a sole trader?

handle.header: What will be handled under the authority?

weapons-ammunition.weapons: How will the prohibited weapons/component parts be obtained?
weapons-ammunition.weapons,ammunition: How will the prohibited weapons/component parts and ammunition be obtained?
weapons-ammunition.ammunition: How will the prohibited ammunition be obtained?

weapons-ammunition.weapons: Will the prohibited weapons/component parts be stored on the company's premises?
weapons-ammunition.weapons,ammunition: Will the prohibited weapons/component parts and ammunition be stored on the company's premises?
weapons-ammunition.ammunition: Will the prohibited ammunition be stored on the company's premises?

weapons-ammunition.weapons: Will the prohibited weapons/component parts be stored on the sole trader's premises?
weapons-ammunition.weapons,ammunition: Will the prohibited weapons/component parts and ammunition be stored on the sole trader's premises?
weapons-ammunition.ammunition: Will the prohibited ammunition be stored on the sole trader's premises?

weapons-ammunition.weapons: What will be done with the prohibited weapons/component parts?
weapons-ammunition.weapons,ammunition: What will be done with the prohibited weapons/component parts and ammunition?
weapons-ammunition.ammunition: What will be done with the prohibited ammunition?

weapons.header: Which categories do the weapons/component parts fall under?

weapons-all-that-apply.header: Select all that apply and state the maximum quantities held at any one time. The quantities should reflect the supporting evidence provided, and be as accurate as possible. If the sections and quantities aren't backed up by the evidence you have provided, it may delay the application or result in the authority not being approved.

ammunition.header: Which categories does the prohibited ammunition fall under?

ammunition-all-that-apply.header: Select all that apply and state the maximum quantities held at any one time. The quantities should reflect the supporting evidence provided, and be as accurate as possible. If the sections and quantities aren't backed up by the evidence you have provided, it may delay the application or result in the authority not being approved.

address.cantfind: I can't find the address on the list

postcode-api.not-found: Sorry – we couldn’t find any addresses for that postcode, enter your address manually
postcode-api.cant-connect: Sorry – we couldn’t connect to the postcode lookup service at this time, enter your address manually

authority-holders.header: How many individuals will be named on the authority?

authority-holders.one: What's the full name of the authority holder?
authority-holders.two: What's the full name of the first authority holder?

second-authority-holders-name.header: What's the full name of the second authority holder?

contact.header: Who do we contact about this application?

storage-weapons-ammo.header: What will be stored on the premises?

weapons-ammunition.weapons: Where will the prohibited weapons/component parts be stored?

storage-weapons-ammo.weapons: Where will the prohibited weapons/component parts be stored?
storage-weapons-ammo.weapons,ammunition: Where will the prohibited weapons/component parts and ammunition be stored?
storage-weapons-ammo.ammunition: Where will the prohibited ammunition be stored?

weapons-ammunition.ammunition: Where will the prohibited ammunition be stored?

add-more-addresses.header: You can add further addresses later if required.

contact-details-confirmation.header: A confirmation email of this application will be sent to this address.
